string.name: label
string.description: The text label for the item.

style.name: state
style.description: The item state. Can be any combination of the following values:

listcolfmt.name: align
listcolfmt.description: The alignment for the item. Can be one of wxLIST_FORMAT_LEFT, wxLIST_FORMAT_RIGHT or wxLIST_FORMAT_CENTRE.

colour.name: bg
colour.description: The background color for the item.

colour.label: Text colour
colour.description: The text colour for the item.

bitmap.description: Add a bitmap to the (normal) wxImageList associated with the wxListCtrl parent and associate it with this item. If the imagelist is not defined it will be created implicitly.

bitmap.name: bitmap-small
bitmap.description: Add a bitmap in the 'small' wxImageList associated with the wxListCtrl parent and associate it with this item. If the 'small' imagelist is not defined it will be created implicitly.

int.name: image
int.description: The zero-based index of the image associated with the item in the (normal) image list.

int.name: image-small
int.description: The zero-based index of the image associated with the item in the 'small' image list.

int.name: data
int.description: The client data for the item.
